TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted: Somebody immediately start trying every different way they can think of to turn you into a puff of smoke.

I wish to just watch safely.

I wished not to start a new page, I should have known better.

Edited March 3, 2022 by ColdJ

Granted. When you fell asleep, you get crashed by a SpaceX rocket. 

I wish a girlfriend.

Your wish is hard to curse, true love is what I adore!

I wish for easter eggs

No bunnys allowed. 

I wish a Jeb.

Jeb crashes a rocket into your house.

I wish I had more time to do stuff.

Granted. You receive more time to do stuff. However this come at the price of more tasks being delegated to you. Good luck, friend.

I wish to have fewer responsibilities.

Edited March 4, 2022 by Exploro

Granted: You are put into suspended animation.

I wish I could tell which way the faces were pointing in the editor.

Granted. But you are blind. 

I wish a ICBM.

Granted: Your behind is very cold.

I wish for more space.

You get the expansion of the Universe. It gets so fast that some of the Universe are locked forever, never to be seen.

I wish for more cat food for my cat

Granted: You get a years worth of cat food and then realise you have a small fluffy dog.

I wish I could get the sound right.

Granted.  The sound is right from your point of view.  It couldn't be worse for everyone else l, though.

I wish my shirt was blue.

Granted. Your shirt was painted blue by a naughty boy. 

I wish I can have a better computer.

You got a better man, not a computer.

Spoiler

SOMETIMES IN THE MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT I CAN FEEL YOU AGAINNNN 

I wish I can sing better

Granted:

 

Waiting, watching the clock
It's four o'clock
It's got to stop
Tell him
"Take no more"
She practices her speech as he opens the door
She rolls over
Pretends to sleep as he looks her over

She lies and says she's in love with him
Can't find a better man
She dreams in color, she dreams in red
Can't find a better man
Can't find a better man
Can't find a better man
Oh

Talking to herself
"There's no one else who needs to know"
She tells herself
Memories back when she was bold and strong
And waiting for the world to come along
Swears she knew him, now she swears he's gone

She lies and says she's in love with him
Can't find a better man
She dreams in color, she dreams in red
Can't find a better man
She lies and says she still loves him
Can't find a better man
She dreams in color, she dreams in red
Can't find a better man
Can't find a better man
Can't find a better man

She loved him, yeah
She don't want to leave this way
She feeds him, yeah
That's why she'll be back again

Can't find a better man (Can't find a better man)
Can't find a better man (Can't find a better man)
Can't find a better man (Can't find a better man)
Can't find a better man
 
I wish that worse is better and better is worse.

Granted. You are made of Gold.

I wish a Starship.

Granted.  And nothing happens because you didn't actually wish for anything to happen.  You wished a starship...and then gave no verb.

I wish the KSC was a real place that we could tour.

Granted: You walk around and find that none of the doors work, that they are in fact just painted on and the whole thing is just a cardboard set.

I wish you could walk a Kerbal up to a door, open it and walk inside.

Granted, but it happens so fast you can't see it.

I wish for world peace.

Granted: You get a pet rock. (It is a piece of the world.)

I wish a Llama.

Granted. You installed WinAmp.

I wish the VLC native view was not so ugly.

Granted. Wait! What is a VLC? 

I wish a girlfriend.

Granted: After you stop referencing anything to do with death and destruction for 1 year you will find a girl who will be your friend.

VLC is a software media player that lets you play many formats. Last I knew it was a nasty orange colour.

I wish that you do and get a girlfriend in a year.

Thanks. But I love destruction. 

I wish a GU installed on my computer. (It's not on CKAN!) @Kerbal ProductionsGo and tell the guy to add it on CKAN.

2 hours ago, Abel101126 said:

@Kerbal ProductionsGo and tell the guy to add it on CKAN. 

Oh lord, he's angry.
(it's a modular mod, unlike others, its systems are separated. It's like buying chicken - you choose what you want.)

I wish you understand why.
